1.30.name: wordpress/vertigo
1.30.description: A stylish and fun theme with one column, a custom header, and a custom accent color. It includes special styles for Aside, Gallery, Image, Quote, Link, Chat, Status, Audio and Video post formats. Inspired by the design work of the late Saul Bass, and based on the original design by Matthew Buchanan.
